field.name: expireDate
field.description: Expire Date

field.name: defaultPackagingType
field.description: Default packaging type

field.name: orderFacilityId
field.description: This field contains sensitive information, thus encrypted.

field.name: returnedExcessIssuedQty
field.description: This field holds the quantity which is returned from quantity split or edit traveler quantity if there is excess issuances after split or editing traveler quantity.

field.name: connectSoapUrl
field.description: UPS Soap Connection URL

field.name: defaultPackagingType
field.description: Default packaging type

field.name: productCategoryUrlName
field.description: Category name to be used in URL on store front

field.name: catalogUrlMountPoint
field.description: Catalog Url mount point to be used

field.name: restockingFeePercentage
field.description: Restocking fee percentage

field.name: capturePmntsOnOrdApproval
field.description: Flag to identify if order payments have to be captured when order is added to CSV with value Y or N

field.name: termTypeId
field.description: Order for products of store will be placed with defined term type.

field.name: autoSetFacility
field.description: Mainly used to control nearest facility work flow

field.name: enableExternalPromotion
field.description: Flag to identify if the external promotions are enabled for the store.

field.name: daysToReturn
field.description: Indicates number of days till order can be returned

field.name: restockingFeeFixed
field.description: Indicates Fee charged for Restocking.

field.name: autoAcceptReturn
field.description: Flag to identify if the return will be accepted automatically.

field.name: productIdentifierEnumId
field.description: Product identifier to identify unique product

field.name: enablePreOrderAutoReleasing
field.description: Flag to enable/disable auto preorder releasing on particular store/brand.

field.name: enableBrokering
field.description: Flag to enable/disable brokering on particular store/brand.

field.name: storeLogoImageUrl
field.description: Image path for display brand specific logo

field.name: productUrlName
field.description: Product name to be used in URL on store front

field.name: xSmallImageUrl
field.description: Extra small image URL for product

field.name: thumbnailImageUrl
field.description: Thumbnail image URL for product

field.name: alwaysNewLineItem
field.description: If Y then the product will be added in the cart as a new line item even if it is already present in the cart.

field.name: isInstallationProduct
field.description: Set Y if product is installable.

field.name: requireInspection
field.description: Set Y if product require inspection.By default product requires inspection

field.name: lastIndexedDateTime
field.description: Last date time when the product get indexed

field.name: sequenceNum
field.description: Added this field in order to get the Terms in a specified order.

field.name: allowPickup
field.description: Turn on/off pickup at Facility level

field.name: computedLastInventoryCount
field.description: This field represents computed last inventory count (availableToPromiseTotal - minimumStock) of a product at a certain point of time if availableToPromiseTotal <= minimumStock it will set as 0

field.name: permissionEnumId
field.description: It will be used to set permission to access content.

field.name: isLocked
field.description: Indicates a facility location is locked for reservations or not

field.name: parentTypeId
field.description: This will act as parent return reason Id.

entity.description: The entity will store mapping which will be used during import to map field with external system fields.
